Alneil Mc.Leod wrote:
> Hello,
> 
>        I have a dragon dynasty Katana and I'm interested in finding out what
> the carvings mean, the story behind them.
> I eagerly await your response.

They don't mean squat. It's NOT an Asian design.

I'm sorry, but I really can't say more about it without 
launching into an obscenity-ridden tirade that would make 
grown men flinch and sailors cry.

Tony
